Table of Contents

Namespace osu.Framework.Graphics.Cursor

Classes

BasicContextMenuContainer
ContextMenuContainer

A container which manages a Menu. If a right-click happens on a Drawable that implements IHasContextMenu and exists as a child of the same InputManager as this container, a Menu will be displayed with bottom-right origin at the right-clicked position.

CursorContainer
CursorEffectContainer<TSelf, TTarget>
PopoverContainer
TooltipContainer

Displays Tooltips for all its children that inherit from the IHasTooltip or IHasCustomTooltip interfaces. Keep in mind that only children with HandlePositionalInput set to true will be checked for their tooltips.

TooltipContainer.Tooltip

The default tooltip. Simply displays its text on a gray background and performs no easing.

TouchLongPressFeedback

Interfaces

IHasAppearDelay

A tooltip which provides a custom delay until it appears, override the TooltipContainer-wide default.

IHasContextMenu
IHasCustomTooltip

Implementing this interface allows the implementing Drawable to display a custom tooltip if it is the child of a TooltipContainer. Keep in mind that tooltips can only be displayed by a TooltipContainer if the Drawable implementing IHasCustomTooltip has HandlePositionalInput set to true.

IHasCustomTooltip<TContent>

Implementing this interface allows the implementing Drawable to display a custom tooltip if it is the child of a TooltipContainer. Keep in mind that tooltips can only be displayed by a TooltipContainer if the Drawable implementing IHasCustomTooltip has HandlePositionalInput set to true.

IHasPopover

Interface to be implemented by UI controls that show a Popover on click.

IHasTooltip

Implementing this interface allows the implementing Drawable to display a tooltip if it is the child of a TooltipContainer. The tooltip used is dependent on the implementation of the CreateTooltip() method of the TooltipContainer containing this Drawable.

ITooltip

A tooltip that can be used in conjunction with a TooltipContainer and/or IHasCustomTooltip implementation.

ITooltipContentProvider

Marker interface for interfaces that provide tooltip content.

ITooltip<T>

A tooltip that can be used in conjunction with a TooltipContainer and/or IHasCustomTooltip implementation.
